description:
Sakura finds herself dealing with a fierce dog spirit... but is he really a dog? Later, Rinne wonders if his never ending money problems can be solved by a money spirit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Capture de chien méchant / L`esprit doré / L`héritage
Mouken Hokaku Hoshuu / Kanadama / Akuryou Isan
Supplemental Class for Fierce Dog Catching / Money Spirit / Evil Spirit`s Legacy
猛犬捕獲補習 / 金霊 / 悪霊遺産
